reviewText: Love it.  Duff's amazing, good player, and a great story teller.  Worth the money.
Great video. Awesome insight into Duff's background and style. Just wish he did some GnR stuff in addition to Velvet Revolver.

I am by no means a bass or guitar player, but I've started to learn...

I think this DVD is worth every dollar spent...

Duff Mckagan is an inspirational person and his talent for music is unquestionable,
I am enjoying this DVD very much and watch it over and over again...

He tells us a little back ground of his life and plays his bass like no other and
Yes the man is so good looking...

I have gotten into Velvet Revolver and believe this DVD is amazing...
